title: Muff Busters
overview: They have charisma, uniqueness, nerve and talent. But do these gals have the stuff to BUST these MUFFS? Join Heidi N Closet & Rock M Sakura as they dive in and put today's most popular myths (and each other) to the ultimate test. Each episode, Rock and Heidi take a widely accepted myth, read it the house down and spill the tea on what they believe are the facts before testing their hypotheses. They're busting open these myths to get to the truth, hunty! But will the science leave them gagging? Get ready boots for FACT and FICTION to collide on Muff Busters!
